alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:32PM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Kansas, Wichita and Greeley Counties. In Colorado, Cheyenne County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
